name: Diggy Ball
description:
Dig into the ground and lead the ball straight to the finish line! Collect stars to enter the fever mode and become unstoppable! Are you up for the challange?

• Physics based runner
• Endless gameplay
• Incremental difficulty

Start playing Diggy Ball today - join Orbital Knight community loved by millions all over the world.
